component.name: Pamet
component.summary: An app for personal note organization

description.p: The app features map-like navigation, multiple pages with hyperlinking, note moving/resize, limited (as of now) style changes. The notes can hold an image, text, link. There's also a backup service, notes that can invoke scripts, among other extra functionality, that's still being developed.
The app is still in alpha, UI bugs are to be expected, but the storage and backup functionalities should be stable.
